client_problem: The business needs accurate sales forecasts to improve revenue planning and resource allocation across strategic initiatives. Currently, unpredictable sales trends and varied contract types impact forecasting accuracy, hindering decision-making. Developing a robust model to predict revenue and close dates is essential for enhancing sales strategy and optimizing operational efficiency.

generated_resume.project_name: Accurate Sales Forecasting for Revenue Planning
